name: Tank battle.io - New tank war games
name_original: Tank battle.io - New tank war games
description:
The most popular classic game！
Childhood memories, tank battle!
Totally new Tank. io!

Maybe you like slither.io,Agar.io,Diep.io,Paper.io.
Now you will like this game!

Humanized operation, left and right hand, switch freely, more automatic fire mode to liberate both hands!
Dozens of tanks evolved, full of personality, combat strength burst table.
Exciting, once started, you can not stop!
Come and download! Become a battlefield overlord, warlords!
